transition:
- send action_goal_req_client_X
- param goal_field_<1, ..., n>

div.div:
transition:
- if thread_available:
- send action_goal_accepted
- param goal_id
- send action_thread_start
- param thread_id
- param goal_id
- param goal_fields
- else
- send action_goal_rejected
- param goal_id

div.div:
transition action_thread_start if thread_id == X
- assign goal_id
- assign goal_fields

transition if feedback_available
- send action_feedback
- param goal_id
- param feedback_fields

transition action_goal_req_client_x
- assign: goal_fields
- send action_goal_handle
- param goal_id
- param goal_fields

div.div: The goal_id is assigned from the Action Handler, and is mapped to exactly one client

div.div: The same strategy is applied for all different replies coming from the action server

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 492px;

p.font:
transition action_goal_<acc/rej>
- assign goal_id
-if goal_id == client1_goal_id
- send action_goal_<acc/rej>_client_1
- elseif goal_id == client_2_goal_id
- ...
